attributes.action: recognise that chavs are not human because they have no empathy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Empathy is what makes us human, "people" with no empathy cannot therefore be classed as human. Therefore we ask the PM to recognise that chavs are not human because they have no empathy

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
